description:
Want a catchy presentation? We teach you how to create dynamic presentations that do the work for you! Why give the same speech over and over again? This course is designed to teach you how to create an amazing presentation that you can share with customers indefinitely in video format.

You will learn how to:

  • Create animated presentations quickly
  • Use the right software and hardware
  • Operate the software and hardware
  • Add video clips, images, backgrounds, text and effects to your presentation
  • Export your presentation as a video when you are done

You only have a few seconds to catch the attention of your target audience. This course will teach you what you need to know to knock their socks off!
title: How to Make a Great Presentation
